document.full_text: japanese officials declared the accident at the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant a level 7 emergency on tuesday, putting it on par with the accident at chernobyl in 1986.
document.title: the lede: a look at the nuclear accident scale
lines_and_colors: japanese officials declared the accident at the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant a level 7 emergency on tuesday, putting it on par with the accident at chernobyl in 1986.
